  • Post date 15 October 2021
  • No Comments on Anchorage Whale Watching

Whales Fin, minke, humpback, gray, and orca whales can all be seen off the coast of Anchorage. Many whales can be seen off the coast of Alaska and Anchorage is one of the best viewing spots. This post explains how to catch a glimpse of these amazing mammals. Best times to go Early march to […]

Fairbanks Alaska

  • Post author By admin
  • Post date 15 October 2021
  • No Comments on Fairbanks Alaska

Fairbanks Alaska Aurora Season Fairbanks Alaska is ideal for northern lights viewing because it is under the “Auroral Oval,”. Additionally, Fairbanks’ low precipitation and distance from coastal areas contribute to consistently clear nights. All combined these variables make the Fairbanks region an outstanding destination for possible aurora borealis viewing. When to see this phenomenon Aurora Season is […]
